onset.Description: Onset (in seconds) of the event from the beginning of the first datapoint. Negative onsets account for events before the first stored data point.

duration.Description: Duration of the event in seconds from onset. Must be zero, positive, or 'n/a' if unavailable. A zero value indicates an impulse event.

sample.Description: The event onset time in number of sampling points.First sample is 0.

value: Encodes the attended story and chapter. The first digit corresponds to the story (1=Female, 2=Male) and the last two digits correspond to the chapter.

trial_type.Description: The type, category, or name of the event.

attend: The narrator the subject was instructed to attend on that trial.
chapter: The chapter of both stories played on each trial. Note that the same chapter was played from each story.
